column2: These walls, although not as magnificent as the walls surrounding the ancient City, are designed to be just as obstinate for any opposing forces.
These walls, although not as magnificent as the wall surrounding the ancient City, are designed to be just as obstinate for any opposing forces.
Built with the power of Omashuan earthbending and ingenuity, the Gujian River Dikes are the first line of defence against incursions from the East.

The Omashu delivery system is a complex system of chutes that are used to transport mail and packages throughout the city. The system consists of a series of slides and chutes through which various parcels travel in order to arrive at a certain destination. Earthbending sends the packages up the slides, while gravity moves them down. The slides are outfitted with numerous loading points, which also operate through earthbending.
